src/serial/zsc-dgr-src/parameters.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Read input parameters from files "properties.in" and "discrete.in" and define constants for the simulation in the dual grid D2Q5/D2Q9 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM.
